SALES ASSOCIATE
Professional Summary
I am talented individual who will bring my sales talent, fashion sense, and passion for clothing to your company. i have a proven track record of success in sales .i am looking for suitable position with a company that offers there staff superb career opportunities, job enrichment and a supportive work environment.
Core Qualifications
Sales expertise Accurate money handling Team player mentality
Reliable and dependable
Goal-oriented Excellent communication skills Sales force training Persuasive communication expertise

EXPERIENCE

04/2015 to 05/2016
Company Name
City ,
State
Responsible for actively promoting and selling the company's products to a wide range of customers in a very competitive market place.
Contacting potential customers that have shown an interest in the company's products and then selling to them.
Actively seeking new accounts in a wide variety of locations.
Updating of customer information in paper records and on computer databases.
Handling the complete sales process.
Researching new market and sales opportunities.
Educating clients on the company's products and services.
Converting prospects into active clients.
Keeping in touch with customers via a range of mediums such as phone calls, letters, Email and SMS.
Executing an organized, efficient and structured sales process making outbound sales calls.
Sale/Customer Service Representative

12/2012 to 05/2015
Company Name
City ,
State
Serviced existing accounts, obtained orders, and established new accounts by planning and organized daily work schedule to call on existing or potential sales outlets and other trade factors.
Established or identified prices of goods, services or admission, and tabulate bills using calculators, cash registers, or optical price scanners.
Received payment by cash, check, credit cards Issue receipts, refunds, credits, or change due to customers.
Submitted orders by referring to price lists and product literature.
Kept management informed by submitting activity and results reports, such as daily call reports, weekly work plans, and monthly and annual territory analyses.
Monitored competition by gathering current marketplace information on pricing, new products.
Recommend changes in products, service, and policy by evaluating results and competitive developments.
Maximized sales opportunities through outstanding customer service.
Established and maintain good customer relations, with both internal and external customers.
Spent time in the field promoting demonstrating company products.

10/2010 to 02/2011
Company Name
City ,
State
Ensure that each customer receives outstanding service by providing a friendly environment, which includes greeting and acknowledging every customer.
Maintain an awareness of all promotions and advertisements.
Receive payment by cash, check, credit cards Issue receipts, refunds, credits, or change due to customers.

June 2009
Charles Churn Christian Academy

advertisements, calculators, cash registers, competitive, credit, clients, customer relations, customer service, databases, Email, Issue receipts, letters, market, market and sales, pricing, Researching, selling, sales, scanners, SMS, structured, phone

<JD_START>
Job Title: Sales Representative

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
Job Overview:
As a Sales Rep, you will play a pivotal role in accelerating sales growth and surpassing revenue targets by honing in on specific products, services, or market segments. Your specialized knowledge in the designated area will empower you to effectively articulate product features and advantages, address customer inquiries, and deliver tailored solutions to meet their unique requirements.
Key Responsibilities:
Cultivate an in-depth understanding of the company's offerings, including products, services, and solutions.Identify target markets, industries, or customer segments for the designated product or service.Proactively generate leads through diverse channels, leveraging techniques like cold calling, networking, and referrals.Foster and nurture relationships with customers, comprehending their business challenges and needs.Conduct product demonstrations, presentations, and technical discussions to highlight the value proposition of the offering.Collaborate closely with internal teams, such as marketing and product development, to align sales strategies with market demands.Provide precise and timely quotations, proposals, and pricing details to customers.Negotiate sales agreements, terms, and conditions to ensure mutually advantageous outcomes for all parties involved.Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and market shifts related to the designated product or service.Exceed sales targets, quotas, and performance metrics established by the company.Maintain meticulous records of sales activities, customer engagements, and pipeline management using CRM software.Continuously enhance product knowledge, sales prowess, and industry expertise through ongoing training and professional development initiatives.Qualifications:
Demonstrated track record of success in sales, specializing in specific products, services, or market segments.Profound knowledge and comprehension of the designated product or service, encompassing technical specifications and applications.Exceptional communication and interpersonal abilities, with a knack for building rapport and credibility with customers.Driven by results, with an unwavering commitment to achieving sales targets and propelling business expansion.Capable of working autonomously and collaboratively, engaging with colleagues across various departments.Proficiency in sales methodologies, negotiation tactics, and objection resolution techniques.Superior organizational and time management proficiencies, adept at prioritizing tasks efficiently.Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Engineering, or a related field is preferred.Additional Requirements:
Flexibility to travel as required for client meetings, trade shows, and industry gatherings.Openness to working outside traditional business hours to accommodate client schedules and project deadlines.

Experience Level (if available): None
<JD_END>
